About This Site

This site was developed, designed and created by myself, Adam T Deyes. It is built on a range of different tools and programming languages such as but not limited to, HTML, JavaScript, sass, ssh, github and visual studio code.

If you have an interest in this website or my web skills please get in contact with me here.
